data: GYN CARE AMB Laminaria Insertion (1 Day) (Multiphase)
Nurse to initiate the Laminaria Insertion phase of this PowerPlan
Select [azithromycin OR doxycycline] AND metroNIDAZOLE for prophylaxis
1 g, PO, pre-procedure, drug form: tab
100 mg, PO, pre-procedure, drug form: cap
500 mg, PO, pre-procedure, drug form: tab
Select miFEPRIStone for cervical prep for patients greater than 18 weeks gestation
200 mg, PO, pre-procedure, drug form: tab
500 mg, PO, pre-procedure, drug form: tab
400 mg, PO, pre-procedure, drug form: tab
20 mL, cervical, once, drug form: inj
1.5 mg, intra-amniotic, once, drug form: inj
4 mg, PO, once, PRN nausea, drug form: tab
8 mg, PO, once, PRN nausea, drug form: tab
Restricted to patients who cannot tolerate other forms of ondansetron
4 mg, PO, once, PRN nausea, drug form: tab-oral dissolve
8 mg, PO, once, PRN nausea, drug form: tab-oral dissolve
Cervix, Routine, Unit collect, Collected, Collection: T;N, once
Vagina, Routine, Unit Collect, Collected, Collection: T;N, once
Titrate O2 to keep SpO2 Other (please specify), greater than 95%
Nurse to initiate the Discharge phase of this PowerPlan
Discontinue Laminaria Insertion phase of GYN CARE AMB Laminaria Insertion (1 Day) (Multiphase) PowerPlan
200 mg, PO, as directed, drug form: kit, Dispense Take Home Medication, dispense qty: 24 tab
1 tab, PO, as directed, drug form: kit, Dispense Take Home Medication, Dispense qty: 4 tab
100 mg, PO, as directed, drug form: cap, Dispense Take Home Medication, dispense qty: 14 cap
500 mg, PO, as directed, drug form: cap, Dispense Take Home Medication, dispense qty: 4 cap
500 mg, PO, as directed, drug form: kit, Dispense Take Home Medication, dispense qty: 6 cap
500 mg, PO, as directed, drug form: cap, Dispense Take Home Medication, dispense qty: 14 cap
4 mg, PO, as directed, drug form: tab-oral dissolve, Dispense Take Home Medication, dispense qty: 2 tab
1 kit, IM, as directed, drug form: kit, Dispense Take Home Medication, Dispense qty: 1 kit
